sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 8 meters and a height of 5 meters. What is the area of the parallelogram in square meters?
message_2:
The area of a parallelogram can be found using the formula: Area = base × height. In this case, the base is 8 meters and the height is 5 meters. 

Area = 8 meters × 5 meters = 40 square meters

The area of the parallelogram is 40 square meters.
